text: Nava Arad (; 4 December 1938 â€“ 21 February 2022) was an Israeli Labor Party politician. She was a member of the Knesset between 1981 and 1992, and again from 1995 until 1996. Arad was born in Kibbutz Hulda in Mandatory Palestine. Arad died on 21 February 2022, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Israeli politicians
title: Nava Arad
